data.text:
The Secret of Skeleton Island is a 2007 German mystery adventure family film starring Chancellor Miller, Nick Price, and Cameron Monaghan.[1][2] It is the first movie in the The Three Investigators film series and is loosely based on the novel of the same name.

A second movie titled The Secret of Terror Castle (film) was released on March 19, 2009.

Synopsis[]

“ Three kid detectives go on an epic journey to eerie Skeleton Island. Once home to pirates, it's now plagued by a mysterious beast. ”

—Official Amazon Description[2]

Plot[]

Cast[]

Chancellor Miller as Jupiter Jones

Nick Price as Peter Crenshaw

Cameron Monaghan as Bob Andrews

Naima Sebe as Chris

Nigel Whitmey as Al Crenshaw

Akin Omotoso as Gamba

Fiona Ramsay as Miss Wilbur

Langley Kirkwood as Tom Farraday

James Faulkner as Bill

Andreas Fröhlich as the man at the junkyard

Oliver Rohrbeck as the man at the hotel

Nicola Barbour as an auction assistant (uncredited)

The Filmbewertungsstelle Wiesbaden certified the film as "particularly valuable".[4]
